message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product. I think it would be perfect for you! I'm asking $200 for it. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I was hoping to keep my spending within $80. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $160?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $160 is still a bit too low for me. Could you meet me halfway at $180?
Hello Alice, thank you for your response. I appreciate your position, but I am still looking to stay within my budget of $80. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $170?
